## Indicator Name
Name of the indicator (e.g., Ichimoku Cloud, Williams %R)

## Description
Brief description of what this indicator does and what it measures.

## Formula/Algorithm
Provide the mathematical formula or algorithm for the indicator.

```
Example:
RSI = 100 - (100 / (1 + RS))
where RS = Average Gain / Average Loss
```

List the parameters this indicator requires:
- Window/Period: [e.g., 14]
- Other parameters...
